name: Lighthouse (Barlogdao)
description:
This is a small 2D roguelike shooter whic made solo in a week. The game was originally created for submition in UDC Jam #25, but I didn't upload it before the deadline. 

In this game, you can shoot strange creatures to gain energy, unlock new weapons, and upgrade your lighthouse to shoot strange creatures more often and more spectacularly. There are 7 rounds (days) in the game, during which you need to accumulate enough energy to get out of the island. Simple and addictive gameplay, nice graphics, pleasant music will definitely give you 10 minutes of exciting experience!

CONTROLS

- LMB : shoot

- RMB / Spacebar : use radar (if unlocked)

- A / D : change weapons ( if multiple weapons are unlocked)

- 1,2,3 : choice concrete weapon ( if multiple weapons are unlocked)

- ESC : Pause (Not in WebGL fullscreen mode)
